Parishioners of a half-dozen closed Roman Catholic churches have suffered another setback -- but they aren’t ready to give up yet. (Boston Globe)

Fighter jets assist in diverting North Carolina-bound plane to Bangor

US Airways Flight 787 from France to North Carolina was diverted to Bangor, Maine, due to "suspicious behavior" by a passenger. (Boston Globe)
